goal.ch:
一、理解基礎文法與句型概念。
二、培養基礎閱讀、聽解、會話、書寫能力。
三、培養對日本社會與文化之理解。
四、培育自主學習的能力。

★遵學校規定到校上課。
（倘若學校公告因防疫需求而需改為線上課程時，相關網址訊息如下：
視訊通話連結：https://meet.google.com/svk-sryt-cva
請注意，若學校未公告需實施線上課程，上述網址不會開放。）
goal.en:
1.Understand basic Japanese grammar concepts and Japanese sentence structure.
2.Cultivate the basic ability of reading / listening / speaking, and writing skills.
3.Cultivate the understanding of Japanese society and 
culture. 
4.Cultivate the ability to learn independently.

outline.ch:
★導言、複習日語A課程所學
★第八課～第十一課（部分）形容詞句說明
★第十一課～第十二課：日語、漢語動詞邏輯說明（存在、比較、並列、希望）
outline.en:
★The introduction and Review what we have learned in A
★Lesson8~11:The explanation of adjective sentences
★Lesson11~12:Sentence-making in Japanese and Chinese and English
